wikipedia_page.main: Sir Francis Fenwick Pearson, 1st Baronet,  (13 June 1911 – 17 February 1991) was a British colonial administrator, farmer and politician.

response: *Sir Francis Pearson, former MP for Clitheroe, was Chairman of the Central Lancashire New Town Development Corporation from 1971.
